ygData.subject: RE: Welcome to EQ_rainbow@onelist.com
ygData.msgSnippet: Have any of you dealt with the recent GM run campaigns lately ? I am talking about the Undead King mini-campaign.. these types of things give the game that
ygData.messageBody:
Have any of you dealt with the recent GM run campaigns lately ? I am talking
about the Undead King mini-campaign.. these types of things give the game
that extra something that is necessary for longetivity ingame. I have not
seen this on the Rodcet Nife server, but apparently they are happening now.
I wonder if we can have a Gm run Queer campaign.. you know.. a parade of
sorts.. hhhmmm... :oP .. just being silly.. but seriosuly.. i am looking to
hear from people who have seen it on their server.
